member.name: KERB_QUERY_DOMAIN_EXTENDED_POLICIES_REQUEST
member.summary: Contains information used to query the domain for the extended policies. You must have the SeTcbPrivilege privilege set.

member.name: KERB_QUERY_DOMAIN_EXTENDED_POLICIES_REQUEST.MessageType
member.summary: A value of the enumeration that lists the types of messages that can be sent to the Kerberos authentication package by calling the function. This member must be set to KerbQueryDomainExtendedPoliciesMessage.

member.name: KERB_QUERY_DOMAIN_EXTENDED_POLICIES_REQUEST.DomainName
member.summary: The name of the domain that you are querying for the extended policies.
